content: with help from this pattern you can make a little cute bunny in the bonnet i m sure you will love this teeny weeny bunny the size is approx 12-13 cm 4 7-5 1 with sport / 5 ply 12 wpi yarn and 2 00 mm crochet hook size us - b/1 uk - 13 toy and pattern © 2021 marina chuchkalova übersetzung aus dem russischen © 2021 katharina sokiran
